category: #can not use multiple aptitudes of the same category
requiresDock: #if true, can only be swapped when docked
description: #Shown for interactions where you acquire an officer.

name: Automation
description: An aptitude that allows for the recovery and deployment of automated ships. The skills within the aptitude act to further increase the fleets capability to use autonomous drones.

name: Management
description: An aptitude for the general handling of your fleet, enabling multiple improvements to all parts of the fleet and improving your officers across the board.
